tweet.text: Dec. 1987: Pres. Reagan and Mikhail Gorbachev signed the INF Treaty, agreeing “to instruct their negotiators in Geneva to work toward the completion of [START]…preferably in time for signature...during the next meeting of leaders of state” https://t.co/QrhdtClTMj https://t.co/MTslcFz6q0
tweet.html: Dec. 1987: Pres. Reagan and Mikhail Gorbachev signed the INF Treaty, agreeing “to instruct their negotiators in Geneva to work toward the completion of [START]…preferably in time for signature...during the next meeting of leaders of state” history.state.gov/historicaldocu…
